sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The vision of John Perrot wherein is contained the future state of Europe, &c., particularly the empire of Greece, France, Germany, Spain, and England : as it was shewed him in the Island of Jamaica, a little before this death, and sent by him to a friend in London for a warning to his native country : published at the request of some of his friends / by a lover of Sions seed. J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?
[2], 6 p.
[s.n.], London : 1682.
Reproduction of original in Friends' Library, London.
=======

J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?
[2], 6 p.
[s.n.], London : 1682.
Reproduction of original in Friends' Library, London.
